Artifact table-of-contents navigation guide
O Quick navigation to all components in the schema.

Artifact element-types-reference quick reference
O Complete reference for all element type keywords and their behaviors.

Section type_summary 2 Element Type Summary
D
D | Type | Scope | Resolution | Navigation |
D |------|-------|------------|------------|
D | `key` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `word` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `text` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `number` | Local | Immediate | Field access only |
D | `ref` | Global | Pass 1 | `Its field actor` |
D | `link` | Sibling | Pass 1 | `Its field actor` |
D | `ref_copy` | Previous | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `ref_child` | Parent→Child | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `up_copy` | Ancestor | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `type_of` | Child by type | Pass 2+ | `Its field actor` |
D | `tree` | Local | Immediate | `Its field.up/down/left/right actor` |
D
Section type_resolution_passes 2 Multi-Pass Resolution Details
D
D **Pass 1: Direct References**
D - `ref`: Global lookup by key in Find index
D - `link`: Parent-scoped lookup by key in FindIn index
D
D **Pass 2+: Derived References**
D - `ref_copy`: Copy pointer from previous resolved field
D - `ref_child`: Look up child in previously resolved parent
D - `up_copy`: Walk parent chain to ancestor type
D - `type_of`: Match child by component type name
D
D The loader continues passes until all references resolve or error count stabilizes.

Artifact domain-component structure overview

O Comp Domain parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Domain component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | name | key | . | + | Domain name |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D | version | word | . | + | Schema version |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${name}
D ${desc}
D ${version}
D ${Project_domain.project}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Project_domain actor  [Reverse link to Project](#project-component)
D ```

Artifact hardware-component structure overview

O Comp Hardware parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Hardware component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | hardware | key | . | + | Identifier (e.g., gpu_a100, tpu_v5) |
D | backend | word | . | + | cuda, rocm, tpu, cpu |
D | dynamic_dispatch | word | . | + | true/false for runtime routing |
D | constraints | text | . | * | Hardware limits |
D | memory_model | text | . | * | Memory hierarchy characteristics |
D | routing_latency | text | . | * | Expert routing overhead |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${hardware}
D ${backend}
D ${dynamic_dispatch}
D ${constraints}
D ${memory_model}
D ${routing_latency}
D ${desc}
D ${Kernel_hardware.kernel}
D ${Dynamickernel_hardware.dynamic_kernel}
D ${Optimization_target.target}
D ${Fusion_hardware.fusion}
D ${Searchop_hardware.search_op}
D ${Expertroutingop_hardware.routing_op}
D ${Model_hardware.model}
D ${Config_target.config}
D ${Targetconfig_hardware.target_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Gpu actor  [Link to Gpu](#gpu-component)
D Its Kernel_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its Dynamickernel_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Dynamickernel](#dynamickernel-component)
D Its Optimization_target actor  [Reverse link to Optimization](#optimization-component)
D Its Fusion_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Fusion](#fusion-component)
D Its Searchop_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Searchop](#searchop-component)
D Its Expertroutingop_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Expertroutingop](#expertroutingop-component)
D Its Model_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Model](#model-component)
D Its Config_target actor  [Reverse link to Config](#config-component)
D Its Targetconfig_hardware actor  [Reverse link to Targetconfig](#targetconfig-component)
D ```

Artifact gpu-component structure detail

O Comp Gpu parent Hardware FindIn

O Defines a Gpu component with FindIn searchability under parent Hardware, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | gpu_id | key | . | + | GPU identifier |
D | arch | word | . | + | Architecture (ampere, hopper, rdna3) |
D | sm_count | word | . | + | Streaming multiprocessor count |
D | memory_gb | word | . | + | Memory capacity |
D | bandwidth | word | . | + | Memory bandwidth GB/s |
D | sparse_support | word | . | + | true/false for sparse tensor cores |
D | moe_optimized | word | . | + | true/false for MoE acceleration |
D | dynamic_shapes | word | . | + | true/false for dynamic shape support |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${gpu_id}
D ${arch}
D ${sm_count}
D ${memory_gb}
D ${bandwidth}
D ${sparse_support}
D ${moe_optimized}
D ${dynamic_shapes}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.hardware}
D ${Dynamickernel_gpu_target.dynamic_kernel}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its Dynamickernel_gpu_target actor  [Reverse link to Dynamickernel](#dynamickernel-component)
D ```

Artifact kernel-component structure overview

O Comp Kernel parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Kernel component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | kernel | key | . | + | Unique kernel name |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | + | Target hardware |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D | signature | text | . | + | Function signature |
D | body | text | . | + | Implementation template |
D | dynamic | word | . | * | true/false for runtime configuration |
D | routing_aware | word | . | * | true/false for expert routing |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${kernel}
D ${hardware}
D ${desc}
D ${signature}
D ${body}
D ${dynamic}
D ${routing_aware}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${Dynamickernel_copy_kernel.dynamic_kernel}
D ${Fusion_fused_kernel.fusion}
D ${Op_kernel.op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Dynamickernel actor  [Link to Dynamickernel](#dynamickernel-component)
D Its Kernelparam actor  [Link to Kernelparam](#kernelparam-component)
D Its Kernelop actor  [Link to Kernelop](#kernelop-component)
D Its hardware actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its Dynamickernel_copy_kernel actor  [Reverse link to Dynamickernel](#dynamickernel-component)
D Its Fusion_fused_kernel actor  [Reverse link to Fusion](#fusion-component)
D Its Op_kernel actor  [Reverse link to Op](#op-component)
D ```

Artifact dynamickernel-component structure detail

O Comp Dynamickernel parent Kernel FindIn

O Defines a Dynamickernel component with FindIn searchability under parent Kernel, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | dynamic_kernel | key | . | + | Dynamic kernel name |
D | copy_kernel | up_copy | Kernel | + | Base kernel reference |
D | hardware | ref_copy | Hardware | + | Target hardware |
D | gpu_target | ref_child | GPU | * | Target GPU device |
D | config_params | text | . | + | Runtime configuration parameters |
D | branching | word | . | + | true/false for conditional paths |
D | shape_dependent | word | . | + | true/false for shape polymorphism |
D | dispatch_cost | text | . | * | Overhead for dynamic dispatch |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${dynamic_kernel}
D ${copy_kernel}
D ${hardware}
D ${gpu_target}
D ${config_params}
D ${branching}
D ${shape_dependent}
D ${dispatch_cost}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.kernel}
D ${copy_kernel.kernel}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${gpu_target.gpu_id}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its copy_kernel actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its hardware actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its gpu_target actor  [Link to Gpu](#gpu-component)
D ```

Artifact kernelop-component structure detail

O Comp Kernelop parent Kernel FindIn

O Defines a Kernelop component with FindIn searchability under parent Kernel, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | op | key | . | + | Operation primitive name |
D | desc | text | . | * | Operation description |
D | input_rank | word | . | * | Expected input rank |
D | output_rank | word | . | * | Expected output rank |
D | dimension_calc | text | . | + | Code to calculate dimensions |
D | block_size | word | . | + | Threads per block |
D | grid_calc | text | . | + | Grid size calculation formula |
D | dynamic_launch | word | . | * | true/false for runtime config |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${op}
D ${desc}
D ${input_rank}
D ${output_rank}
D ${dimension_calc}
D ${block_size}
D ${grid_calc}
D ${dynamic_launch}
D ${parent.kernel}
D ${Op_kernel_op.op}
D ```

D ```

D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | target | ref | Hardware | + | Target device |
D | type | word | . | + | expert_fusion, nas_cache, meta_opt |
D | params | text | . | * | Optimization parameters |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |

D | desc | text | . | * | Description |

Artifact framework-component structure overview

O Comp Framework parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Framework component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | framework | key | . | + | Framework name (pytorch, jax, tensorflow) |
D | language | word | . | + | python, c++ |
D | paradigm | word | . | + | dynamic, static, jit |
D | runtime | word | . | + | eager, graph, xla |
D | nas_support | word | . | + | true/false |
D | moe_support | word | . | + | true/false |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${framework}
D ${language}
D ${paradigm}
D ${runtime}
D ${nas_support}
D ${moe_support}
D ${desc}
D ${Model_framework.model}
D ```

Artifact pytorch-component structure detail

O Comp Pytorch parent Framework FindIn

O Defines a Pytorch component with FindIn searchability under parent Framework, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | pytorch_id | key | . | + | Identifier |
D | version | word | . | + | Version string |
D | features | text | . | * | Features list |
D | torch_compile | word | . | + | true/false for torch.compile |
D | dynamo | word | . | + | true/false for TorchDynamo |
D | fx_graph | word | . | + | true/false for FX graph tracing |
D | vmap_support | word | . | + | true/false for vectorization |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${pytorch_id}
D ${version}
D ${features}
D ${torch_compile}
D ${dynamo}
D ${fx_graph}
D ${vmap_support}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.framework}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Framework](#framework-component)
D ```

Artifact searchspace-component structure overview

O Comp Searchspace parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Searchspace component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | space | key | . | + | Search space name |
D | space_name | word | . | + | Display name |
D | type | word | . | + | cell_based, global, hierarchical |
D | dimensions | word | . | + | Number of searchable dimensions |
D | discrete | word | . | + | true/false for discrete choices |
D | param_count | text | . | + | Parameter count range |
D | flops_range | text | . | + | FLOPS range |
D | constraints | text | . | * | Architectural constraints |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${space}
D ${space_name}
D ${type}
D ${dimensions}
D ${discrete}
D ${param_count}
D ${flops_range}
D ${constraints}
D ${desc}
D ${Model_search_space.model}
D ${Architecturesearchop_search_space.search_op}
D ${Searchspaceop_search_space.space_op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Searchspacecode actor  [Link to Searchspacecode](#searchspacecode-component)
D Its Architectureparam actor  [Link to Architectureparam](#architectureparam-component)

D Its Architecturesearchop_search_space actor  [Reverse link to Architecturesearchop](#architecturesearchop-component)
D Its Searchspaceop_search_space actor  [Reverse link to Searchspaceop](#searchspaceop-component)
D ```

Artifact searchspacecode-component structure detail

O Comp Searchspacecode parent SearchSpace FindIn

O Defines a Searchspacecode component with FindIn searchability under parent Searchspace, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | space_code_id | key | . | + | Code block identifier |
D | operations_dict | ref | CodeBlock | * | Code for OPERATIONS dictionary |
D | cell_code | ref | CodeBlock | * | Code for cell structure |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${space_code_id}
D ${operations_dict}
D ${cell_code}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.space}
D ${operations_dict.code_id}
D ${cell_code.code_id}
D ```

D ```

D ```

Artifact architectureparam-component structure detail

O Comp Architectureparam parent SearchSpace FindIn

O Defines a Architectureparam component with FindIn searchability under parent Searchspace, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | param | key | . | + | Parameter name |
D | param_type | word | . | + | categorical, continuous, discrete |
D | choices | text | . | * | Categorical choices |
D | range | text | . | * | Continuous/discrete range |
D | coupling | text | . | * | Dependencies on other params |
D | default | word | . | * | Default value |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${param}
D ${param_type}
D ${choices}
D ${range}
D ${coupling}
D ${default}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.space}
D ${Searchspaceop_param_choices.space_op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Searchspace](#searchspace-component)
D Its Enhancedarchitectureparam actor  [Link to Enhancedarchitectureparam](#enhancedarchitectureparam-component)
D Its Searchspaceop_param_choices actor  [Reverse link to Searchspaceop](#searchspaceop-component)
D ```

Artifact searchop-component structure overview

O Comp Searchop parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Searchop component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | search_op | key | . | + | Search operation name |
D | method | word | . | + | random, rl, gradient, evolution |
D | objective | text | . | + | Optimization objective |
D | budget | word | . | + | Search budget (trials/steps) |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | * | Target hardware |
D | early_stop | word | . | + | true/false |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${search_op}
D ${method}
D ${objective}
D ${budget}
D ${hardware}
D ${early_stop}
D ${desc}
D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${Architecturesearchop_search_method.search_op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Architecturegradient actor  [Link to Architecturegradient](#architecturegradient-component)
D Its hardware actor  [Link to Hardware](#hardware-component)
D Its Architecturesearchop_search_method actor  [Reverse link to Architecturesearchop](#architecturesearchop-component)
D ```

Artifact architecturegradient-component structure detail

O Comp Architecturegradient parent SearchOp FindIn

O Defines a Architecturegradient component with FindIn searchability under parent Searchop, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | grad_method | key | . | + | Method name |
D | relaxation | word | . | + | softmax, gumbel, concrete |
D | temperature | word | . | + | Temperature schedule |
D | alternating | word | . | + | true/false for alternating optimization |
D | projection | word | . | + | Method to project continuous to discrete |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${grad_method}
D ${relaxation}
D ${temperature}
D ${alternating}
D ${projection}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.search_op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Searchop](#searchop-component)
D ```

Artifact expertsystem-component structure overview

O Comp Expertsystem parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Expertsystem component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | system | key | . | + | System name |
D | num_experts | word | . | + | Number of experts |
D | expert_type | word | . | + | ffn, attention, conv, custom |
D | capacity | word | . | + | Expert capacity factor |
D | sparse | word | . | + | true/false |
D | load_balance | word | . | + | true/false |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${system}
D ${num_experts}
D ${expert_type}
D ${capacity}
D ${sparse}
D ${load_balance}
D ${desc}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Expert actor  [Link to Expert](#expert-component)
D Its Sparseexpertsystem actor  [Link to Sparseexpertsystem](#sparseexpertsystem-component)
D ```

Artifact expert-component structure detail

O Comp Expert parent ExpertSystem FindIn

O Defines a Expert component with FindIn searchability under parent Expertsystem, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | expert | key | . | + | Expert identifier |
D | specialization | text | . | * | Domain/task specialization |
D | params | word | . | + | Parameter count |
D | active_ratio | word | . | * | Expected activation frequency |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${expert}
D ${specialization}
D ${params}
D ${active_ratio}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.system}
D ```

D ```

O Comp Routernetwork parent . Find

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | router | key | . | + | Router name |
D | type | word | . | + | learned, hash, fixed, load_balanced |
D | top_k | word | . | + | Number of experts per token |
D | capacity_factor | word | . | + | Expert capacity multiplier |
D | aux_loss | word | . | + | true/false for load balancing loss |
D | jitter | word | . | + | true/false for noise during training |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ```
D ${router}
D ${type}

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | layer | key | . | + | Layer identifier |
D | name | word | . | + | Layer name |
D | class_name | word | . | * | Class name |
D | cell_type | word | . | + | normal, reduction, classifier |
D | type | word | . | + | dynamic, searchable, expert, continuous |
D | num_nodes | word | . | * | Number of nodes in cell |
D | stride | word | . | * | Stride value |
D | is_reduction | word | . | * | true/false |
D | code_block | ref | CodeBlock | * | Complete layer code |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |

Artifact op-component structure detail

O Comp Op parent Layer FindIn

O Defines a Op component with FindIn searchability under parent Layer, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | op | key | . | + | Operation name |
D | op_type | type_of | Op | * | Type of Op |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D | dynamic | word | . | * | true/false for runtime behavior |
D | kernel | ref | Kernel | * | Kernel reference |
D | kernel_op | ref_child | KernelOp | * | KernelOp reference |
D | code_block | ref | CodeBlock | * | Complete operation code |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${op}
D ${op_type}
D ${desc}
D ${dynamic}
D ${kernel}
D ${kernel_op}
D ${code_block}
D ${parent.layer}
D ${kernel.kernel}
D ${kernel_op.op}
D ${code_block.code_id}
D ${Schedule_op.seq}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Layer](#layer-component)
D Its Arg actor  [Link to Arg](#arg-component)
D Its Architecturesearchop actor  [Link to Architecturesearchop](#architecturesearchop-component)
D Its Searchspaceop actor  [Link to Searchspaceop](#searchspaceop-component)
D Its kernel actor  [Link to Kernel](#kernel-component)
D Its kernel_op actor  [Link to Kernelop](#kernelop-component)
D Its code_block actor  [Link to Codeblock](#codeblock-component)
D Its Schedule_op actor  [Reverse link to Schedule](#schedule-component)
D ```

D | role | word | . | + | input, output, param, control |

D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Op](#op-component)
D Its tensor actor  [Link to Tensor](#tensor-component)
D ```

Artifact architecturesearchop-component structure detail

O Comp Architecturesearchop parent Op FindIn

O Defines a Architecturesearchop component with FindIn searchability under parent Op, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | search_op | key | . | + | Search op name |
D | search_space | ref | SearchSpace | + | Search space |
D | search_method | ref | SearchOp | + | Search method |
D | candidate_ops | text | . | + | Candidate operation types |
D | selection | word | . | * | Current selected operation |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${search_op}
D ${search_space}
D ${search_method}
D ${candidate_ops}
D ${selection}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.op}
D ${search_space.space}
D ${search_method.search_op}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Op](#op-component)
D Its search_space actor  [Link to Searchspace](#searchspace-component)
D Its search_method actor  [Link to Searchop](#searchop-component)
D ```

O Comp Searchspaceop parent Op FindIn

O Defines a Searchspaceop component with FindIn searchability under parent Op, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | space_op | key | . | + | Operation name in space |
D | op_choices | text | . | + | Available operation choices |
D | search_space | ref | SearchSpace | * | Search space |
D | param_choices | ref_child | ArchitectureParam | * | Searchable parameters |
D | cost_model | text | . | * | FLOPs/memory cost model |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${space_op}
D ${op_choices}
D ${search_space}
D ${param_choices}

D ${desc}
D ${parent.op}
D ${search_space.space}
D ${param_choices.param}

D Its param_choices actor  [Link to Architectureparam](#architectureparam-component)

O Defines a top-level Config component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | config | key | . | + | Config name |
D | target | ref | Hardware | + | Target device |
D | batch | word | . | + | Batch size |
D | dynamic_shapes | word | . | * | true/false |
D | expert_parallel | word | . | * | Expert parallelism degree |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${config}
D ${target}
D ${batch}
D ${dynamic_shapes}
D ${expert_parallel}
D ${desc}

D ${Targetconfig_config.target_id}

D ${layer}

D ${dynamic}

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | target_id | key | . | + | Target identifier |
D | hardware | ref | Hardware | + | Hardware to target |
D | mode | word | . | + | production, search, validation |
D | config | ref | Config | * | Model config |
D | codegen | word | . | + | true/false |
D | priority | word | . | + | primary, fallback, validation |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ${target_id}
D ${hardware}
D ${mode}
D ${config}
D ${codegen}
D ${priority}
D ${desc}

D ${hardware.hardware}
D ${config.config}
D ${Buildrule_validate_against.build_id}

Artifact buildrule-component structure detail

O Comp Buildrule parent Project FindIn

O Defines a Buildrule component with FindIn searchability under parent Project, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | build_id | key | . | + | Build rule name |
D | targets | text | . | + | Target identifiers |
D | output_dir | text | . | + | Output directory |
D | template | word | . | + | Template set |
D | project | up_copy | Project | * | Project reference |
D | validate_against | ref_child | TargetConfig | * | Validation baseline |
D | output_format | word | . | * | Output format for codegen |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description (e.g., "Generate CUDA kernels") |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${build_id}
D ${targets}
D ${output_dir}
D ${template}
D ${project}
D ${validate_against}
D ${output_format}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.project}
D ${project.project}
D ${validate_against.target_id}
D ```

D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Project](#project-component)
D Its project actor  [Link to Project](#project-component)
D Its validate_against actor  [Link to Targetconfig](#targetconfig-component)
D ```

O Comp Projectvalidation parent Project FindIn

O Defines a Projectvalidation component with FindIn searchability under parent Project, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | validation_id | key | . | + | Validation rule identifier |
D | target_configs | list | . | + | Target configurations to validate |
D | hardware_compatibility | word | . | + | true/false check |
D | memory_budget_check | word | . | + | true/false check |
D | capability_check | word | . | + | true/false check |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${validation_id}
D ${target_configs}
D ${hardware_compatibility}
D ${memory_budget_check}
D ${capability_check}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.project}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Project](#project-component)
D ```

O Comp Enumerationcatalog parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Enumerationcatalog component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | enum_id | key | . | + | Enumeration identifier |
D | enum_type | word | . | + | dtype, backend, precision, etc. |
D | valid_values | list | . | + | Supported values |
D | default_value | word | . | + | Default value |
D | framework_specific | text | . | * | Framework-specific variations |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ```
D ${enum_id}
D ${enum_type}
D ${valid_values}
D ${default_value}
D ${framework_specific}
D ${desc}
D ```

Artifact codeblock-component structure overview

O Comp Codeblock parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Codeblock component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | code_id | key | . | + | Code block identifier |
D | code_type | word | . | + | class, function, method, module |
D | language | word | . | + | python, cpp, cuda, opencl |
D | template_body | text | . | + | Complete code with ${variable} placeholders |
D | placeholders | list | . | + | List of template variable names |
D | dependencies | list | . | * | Required imports/includes |
D | base_class | word | . | * | Parent class for inheritance |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ${code_id}
D ${code_type}
D ${language}
D ${template_body}
D ${placeholders}
D ${dependencies}
D ${base_class}
D ${desc}
D ${Searchspacecode_operations_dict.space_code_id}
D ${Searchspacecode_cell_code.space_code_id}
D ${Layer_code_block.layer}
D ${Op_code_block.op}
D ${Operationdef_code_block.name}
D ${Searchmethod_code_block.method}
D ${Trainingconfig_code_block.config_id}
D ${Architecture_main_code.name}
D ${Architecture_config_code.name}
D ${Codedependency_code_block.dependency_id}
D ${Codeblockreference_code_block.ref_id}
D ${Actortemplate_code_block.actor_name}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its Classcode actor  [Link to Classcode](#classcode-component)
D Its Functioncode actor  [Link to Functioncode](#functioncode-component)
D Its Methodcode actor  [Link to Methodcode](#methodcode-component)
D Its Searchspacecode_operations_dict actor  [Reverse link to Searchspacecode](#searchspacecode-component)
D Its Searchspacecode_cell_code actor  [Reverse link to Searchspacecode](#searchspacecode-component)
D Its Layer_code_block actor  [Reverse link to Layer](#layer-component)
D Its Op_code_block actor  [Reverse link to Op](#op-component)
D Its Operationdef_code_block actor  [Reverse link to Operationdef](#operationdef-component)
D Its Searchmethod_code_block actor  [Reverse link to Searchmethod](#searchmethod-component)
D Its Trainingconfig_code_block actor  [Reverse link to Trainingconfig](#trainingconfig-component)
D Its Architecture_main_code actor  [Reverse link to Architecture](#architecture-component)
D Its Architecture_config_code actor  [Reverse link to Architecture](#architecture-component)
D Its Codedependency_code_block actor  [Reverse link to Codedependency](#codedependency-component)

Artifact classcode-component structure detail

O Comp Classcode parent CodeBlock FindIn

O Defines a Classcode component with FindIn searchability under parent Codeblock, meaning instances are searchable within their parent's context.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | class_name | key | . | + | Class name (can use ${name} template) |
D | inherits_from | list | . | * | Parent classes |
D | init_params | list | . | + | Constructor parameters |
D | methods | list | . | + | Method names defined in class |
D | attributes | list | . | * | Class attributes |
D | docstring | text | . | * | Class documentation |
D | framework_specific | word | . | * | pytorch, jax, tensorflow |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${class_name}
D ${inherits_from}
D ${init_params}
D ${methods}
D ${attributes}
D ${docstring}
D ${framework_specific}
D ${desc}
D ${parent.code_id}
D ${Methodcode_parent_class.method_name}
D ```
Section Navigation 2 Command navigation
D ```
D Its parent actor  [Link to Codeblock](#codeblock-component)
D Its Methodcode_parent_class actor  [Reverse link to Methodcode](#methodcode-component)
D ```

D | is_classmethod | word | . | + | true/false |

D | memory_bytes | number | . | * | Memory usage |

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | param_name | key | . | + | Parameter name |
D | param_type | word | . | + | conv, pool, batch_norm, activation |
D | kernel_size | word | . | * | Kernel size (3, 5, 7) |
D | stride | word | . | * | Stride value |
D | padding | word | . | * | Padding value |
D | pool_type | word | . | * | Max, Avg, AdaptiveAvg |
D | activation_type | word | . | * | ReLU, GELU, Swish |

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |

D | method | key | . | + | Method identifier |

D | description | text | . | * | Method description |

D | learning_rate_alpha | number | . | * | Architecture optimizer learning rate |
D | momentum | number | . | * | Momentum value |
D | weight_decay | number | . | * | Weight decay value |
D | grad_clip | number | . | * | Gradient clipping value |
D | temperature | number | . | * | Temperature for softmax |
D | search_epochs | word | . | * | Number of search epochs |
D | code_block | ref | CodeBlock | * | Complete search engine code |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

D ${method}
D ${method_type}
D ${description}
D ${learning_rate_w}

D ${weight_decay}
D ${grad_clip}
D ${temperature}
D ${search_epochs}

D ${desc}
D ${code_block.code_id}

Artifact architecture-component structure overview

O Comp Architecture parent . Find

O Defines a top-level Architecture component with Find searchability, meaning instances can be looked up globally by their key field.

Section element_summary 2 Element Summary
D
D | Element | Type | Target | Check | Description |
D |---------|------|--------|-------|-------------|
D | name | key | . | + | Architecture name |
D | dataset | word | . | + | Target dataset (CIFAR-10, ImageNet) |
D | framework | word | . | + | pytorch, jax, tensorflow |
D | num_cells | word | . | + | Number of cells |
D | init_channels | word | . | + | Initial channel count |
D | num_classes | word | . | + | Number of output classes |
D | search_epochs | word | . | + | Search phase epochs |
D | train_epochs | word | . | + | Training phase epochs |
D | batch_size | word | . | + | Batch size |
D | learning_rate_w | number | . | + | Weight learning rate |
D | learning_rate_alpha | number | . | + | Architecture learning rate |
D | momentum | number | . | + | Momentum |
D | weight_decay | number | . | + | Weight decay |
D | grad_clip | number | . | + | Gradient clipping |
D | temperature | number | . | + | Softmax temperature |
D | main_code | ref | CodeBlock | * | Main program code |
D | config_code | ref | CodeBlock | * | Configuration dataclass code |
D | desc | text | . | * | Description |
D

Section variables 2 Variable fields
D ```
D ${name}
D ${dataset}
D ${framework}
D ${num_cells}
D ${init_channels}
D ${num_classes}
D ${search_epochs}
D ${train_epochs}
D ${batch_size}
D ${learning_rate_w}
D ${learning_rate_alpha}
D ${momentum}
D ${weight_decay}
D ${grad_clip}
D ${temperature}
D ${main_code}
D ${config_code}
D ${desc}
D ${main_code.code_id}
D ${config_code.code_id}
D ```

Artifact reference-resolution-guide workflow overview
O Multi-pass reference resolution algorithm that handles complex reference chains.

Section resolution_order 2 Resolution Order
D References resolve in passes until stable:
D
D **Pass 1: Direct References**
D - `ref`: Direct lookup in global index
D - `link`: Lookup in parent's child index
D
D **Pass 2+: Derived References**
D - `ref_copy`: Copies resolved reference from previous field
D - `ref_child`: Looks up child in previously referenced component
D - `up_copy`: Walks parent chain to find ancestor
D
D The loader repeats passes until error count stops changing (typically 2-4 passes).

Section chaining_pattern 2 Common Chaining Pattern
D ```
D Element base_ref    ref       Target    +
D Element child_ref   ref_child ChildType +
D ```
D First field resolves Target by name, second field looks up ChildType within that Target.

Section up_chain_pattern 2 Up-Chain Pattern
D ```
D Element context     up_copy   Ancestor  +
D Element target      ref_child ChildType +
D ```
D First field walks parents to find Ancestor, second field looks up ChildType within it.

Section common_patterns 2 Common Design Patterns
D
D **Pattern 1: Direct Reference**
D ```
D Element target ref ComponentType +
D ```
D Simple global lookup.
D
D **Pattern 2: Reference Chain**
D ```
D Element parent_ref   ref       Parent +
D Element child_ref    ref_child Child  +
D ```
D Two-level lookup: resolve parent, then find child within parent.
D
D **Pattern 3: Ancestor Lookup**
D ```
D Element ancestor  up_copy   Ancestor +
D Element target    ref_child Target   +
D ```
D Navigate up hierarchy to find ancestor, then look up child within it.
D
D **Pattern 4: Reference Reuse**
D ```
D Element original  ref      Target +
D Element copy      ref_copy Target +
D ```
D Resolve once, copy pointer multiple times for efficiency.
D
D **Pattern 5: Sibling Link**
D ```
D Element sibling link SiblingType +
D ```
D Reference sibling component under same parent.
D
